p: “Most researchers argue that a combination of approaches are needed including: provision of clean syringes through syringe exchange programs (SEPs); frequent HIV testing and linkage to HIV care; antiretroviral therapy initiation after infection to reduce risk of onward transmission through viral suppression; medication assisted therapy; psychosocial support and pre- and post-exposure prophylaxis” : A colon is not needed after including and every point can be separated by commas.
